graph.tree.pq

Class PQTreeReduction<V extends Vertex,E extends Edge<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.tree.pq.PQTreeReduction<V,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - The vertex type
    E - The edge type

    public class PQTreeReduction<V extends Vertex,E extends Edge<V>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of the PQ-tree reduction procedure, as described by Booth and Lueker. Used in their planarity testing and embedding algorithm
    Author:
    Renata
